name: Pigs Might Fly
overview:
Pigs Might Fly is a video ticket redemption game from Sega Amusements USA. With bright, colorful graphics and a moveable action lever, children and adults alike will be entertained by this animated arrival.

With the press of a lever send pigs flying high on a mission to strike down UFOs passing overhead. Each UFO awards a different ticket payout and there's plenty of UFO's to attack. Watch out for the pigeons that try to get in the way and slow down the flight, and when striking a UFO the pig ricochets all over the place. There are also special bonus features that invite players to gain up to 1000 tickets.
